I'm waiting by the phone for the parents to call from the Shink, they should be getting on soon.

2004-06-07

In unrelated news, I've set this up--the new place for me to read the stuff I read (and you can too, over my shoulder): http://readme.forresto.com/

(I got a little crazy adding food blogs in, they can be quite entertaining... there are some real food nerds out there. I like Bloglines because I can now search the blogs that I read--for example for a particular ingredient--and get all of the trusted blogs' posts on that subject. Niftiness.)
___
Also: unrelated: I'm only linking to this b/c the little cassette guy at the end is one of the few commercial toys I had growing up: Breakin' Transformers
